name: Cliganic Organic Essential Oils Set (Top 5 - The Classics) - 100% Pure Natural - Aromatherapy, Candle Making - Peppermint, Lavender, Eucalyptus, Lemongrass & Orange (Packaging May Vary)
short_description: Packaging May Vary - New look, same great product.
Included in this Gift Set: Peppermint, lavender, eucalyptus, lemongrass & orange. essential oils gift set for aromatherapy diffuser.
Certified Organic - Cliganic organic essential oils are proudly USDA organic certified to ensure ultimate quality and integrity.
100% Pure, Single Ingredient Oils - Cliganic organic essential oils are a single-ingredient product. No synthetic additives, ever.
Non-GMO Certified, Vegan & Cruelty-Free - Free from additives, Cliganic aromatherapy oils are proudly non-gmo project verified, certified vegan and cruelty-free.
3rd Party Tested for Purity - Each batch of our essential oils is being tested for purity by a 3rd party independent lab.

name: InnoGear 300ML Essential Oil Diffuser, Premium 5-in-1 Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Diffusers Scent Humidifier Aroma Diffuser Vaporizer Auto-Off Timer for Room Office Home, Yellow, Medium
short_description: Tailored Timer Options: Craft the ideal atmosphere for any activity with four customizable timer settings—continuous diffusion or 60, 180, and 360-minute. Whether you're working, meditating, or winding down for the night, adjust the timer to your exact needs and enjoy a truly personalized ambiance, effortlessly.

Powerful Mist Output: Experience a steady, powerful mist that fills your space with your favorite fragrance, providing continuous humidification without the worry of excess moisture. This oil diffuser is meticulously designed to deliver a cool mist atmosphere throughout the day while maintaining a dry, comfortable environment for your furniture and workspace.

Generous 300ml Capacity: With a large 300ml water tank, this aromatherapy diffuser provides up to 10 hours of continuous operation on a single fill. Perfect for extended periods of relaxation, focus, or sleep, you can enjoy uninterrupted use without the need for frequent refills—making it a hassle-free addition to your daily routine.

Built-in Safety Features: Designed with your safety at the forefront, this aroma diffuser includes essential features such as automatic shut-off when water runs out and overheating protection, ensuring your essential oil diffuser will always operate safely, powering off when needed to prevent any risks, allowing you to enjoy your space without worry.

Whisper-Quiet Operation & Soothing Ambient Lighting: Create a serene atmosphere with whisper-quiet operation (only 23 dB)—perfect for relaxing, working, or meditating. Plus, select from 7 beautiful LED light colors to set the perfect mood, adding a touch of tranquility to any room. Whether you're unwinding or enhancing your focus, the gentle lighting complements the peaceful environment.

name: Flame Diffuser for Essential Oils, 200ml Ultrasonic Aroma Diffusers with Cool Mist, Aromatherapy Diffuser with Auto-Off Protection, Small Humidifier for Home,Office,Bedroom,Gift (Black)
short_description: Polypropylene (Pp) and Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (Abs)

✔️【𝐃𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐫(√) 𝐇𝐮𝐦𝐢𝐝𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐫(√) 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭(√) 𝟑-𝐢𝐧-𝟏】:Our essential oil diffuser can be used as an aroma diffuser & humidifier & night light at the same time.You can add a few drops of your favourite aromatherapy oils into our aroma diffuser to relieve fragrance.This oil diffuser can also consistently emit gentle mist to increase the room’s humidity.Our flame diffuser uses intelligent LED lights combined with mist to create a realistic flame effect.❕️ AC Adaptor is NOT Included! ❕️ Non-Rechargeable!

✔️【𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】:The diffuser for essential oils is palm size but can emit mist continuously for 10 hours under a container volume of 200ml.Our small aroma diffuser is a perfect gadget for any relaxing environment such as a bedroom, home office, yoga, beauty and SPA shop.Essential oil diffusers with your preferred essential oils can achieve the best health benefits through ultrasonic atomization technology.

✔️【𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐒𝐡𝐮𝐭-𝐎𝐟𝐟 𝐅𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚-𝐒𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐭】: The oil diffuser has a built-in water shortage protection chip, which will automatically stop working after a water shortage to prevent damage to your device.Our flame diffuser is featured an ultra-quiet operation of less than 24dB, which creates a peaceful environment to help soothe your mood, relieve stress & improve your sleep quality.

✔️【𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐆𝐢𝐟𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐨𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐔𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬】: This is a multifunctional aroma diffuser with a modern design. This aromatherapy diffuser is perfect for birthday gifts, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Halloween, Christmas, or other celebrated gifts. Note: Our package does not contain essential oils and please clean the base of the container regularly when you add essential oils to our aroma diffuser.

✔️【𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐒𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐚𝐧】: The fire diffuser with professional testing certificates has passed rigorous quality tests. If your essential oil diffuser is damaged, or you have any questions about our product, please contact our support team, and we will help you within 24 hours. We offer a 1-year warranty! (Note: Please use 5V/1A adapter to power the oil diffuser to avoid damage)

name: Air Wick Essential Mist Diffuser, 1ct, Essential Oils Diffuser, Air Freshener
short_description: A MODERN FRAGRANCE EXPERIENCE: Redefine how you experience fragrance; Air Wick Essential Mist is the modern way to transform fragrance infused with natural essential oils into a mist
PORTABLE AND CORDLESS DESIGN: Its cordless design can move from room to room, with no need of being near an outlet; You can bring the power of the mist throughout your home

ADJUSTABLE TO YOUR LIKING: Gadget begins with a 2X initial fragrance boost that fills the room; Then, the device will run for an 8-hour cycle, releasing mist regularly and will then go into standby mode for 16 hours
Each refill provides up to 45 days fragrance based on low setting, no need to add water, each refill comes ready to use, easy to change out the refills

VARIETY: Several premium fragrances available in refills: Lavender and Almond Blossom, Fresh Water Breeze, Mandarin and Sweet Tangerine, Coconut and Pineapple, Peony and Jasmine, Sandalwood, Sweet Melon and Vanilla; seasonal scents like Apple Cinnamon Medley, Pumpkin Spice, Sweet Fruit and Nutmeg, Brown Sugar and Vanilla, Fresh Pine and Juniper and, our Aroma range with Happiness, Sleep, Unwind and Rejuvenate
product_description: Discover the more natural and premium fragrance infused with natural essential oils diffused by mist with Air Wick Essential Mist diffuser. It transforms fragrance infused with natural essential oils into a gentle mist that surrounds your home. Several premium fragrances available in refills: Lavender and Almond Blossom, Mandarin and Sweet Tangerine, Coconut and Pineapple, Peony and Jasmine, Sandalwood, Sweet Melon and Vanilla; seasonal scents like Apple Cinnamon Medley, Pumpkin Spice, Sweet Fruit and Nutmeg, Brown Sugar and Vanilla, Fresh Pine and Juniper and, our Aroma range with Happiness, Sleep, Unwind and Rejuvenate.

name: Homedics SereneScent Fabric Rechargeable Waterless Diffuser, Use with Homedics SereneScent Oil 120ml (Sold Separately) Cordless Aromatherapy, Adjustable Mist & Timer, 6 Calming Lights, Black
short_description: NO WATER, NO HEAT, NO MESS: Enjoy the mess-free, waterless diffuser that gives you a scent for any larger space (bedrooms, living rooms, dining rooms, etc.). A revolutionary alternative to the traditional diffuser or candle, this is a safer way to bring set-and-forget fragrance to your home.
PREMIUM, NATURAL HOME FRAGRANCE: SereneScent home fragrance oils (sold separately) are created with all natural ingredients for a premium mood-boosting layer to home decor.

CUSTOM SCENT EXPERIENCE: Choose from 3 levels for a fragrance mist intensity that's exactly the way you want it. The waterless diffuser works using intermittent mist intervals with pauses to achieve the precise aroma level you desire. The unit does not mist continuously. The base control and app include scent intensity, timer, and lights for easy-to-use experience.
LIGHTS FADE, FRAGRANCE CONTINUES: Enjoy the warm glow of ambient solid or breathing lights in white, red, blue, purple, green, or orange.

CORDLESS & RECHARGEABLE: Enjoy fragrance anywhere with up to 14 hours of battery life before recharging. To recharge, simply plug in your diffuser with the USB-C cord and adapter provided. Full charge takes approximately 6.5 hours.

name: Essential Oil Scent Diffuser: 500ML Aroma Diffuser with Remote Control, Large Fragrance Aromatherapy Diffuser for Office Home Bedroom, Mist Humidifier with 14 Colors LED Lights and waterless Auto-Off
short_description: [Large Capacity]: This essential oil diffuser is a multi-functional flying wing design aromatherapy device With real capacity of 500ml, it provides 15-hour runtime – 2x longer than other diffusers, covering 40m² rooms with aromatic essential oil fragrance, Auto shut-off without water ensure 24/7 safety for families with kids

[2 Mist model]: Our diffuser can provide stable cool mist, Switch between Gentle Mist (30ml/h) and Intense Mist (60ml/h) to regulate humidity in different scenarios, Ultra-quiet <23dB noise level—quieter than breathing, combined with eco-friendly and fresh fragrances to bring you a cozy and quiet environment.

[4 time setting]: The diffuser offers 4 timing modes that can be set to run for 1/3/6H timer functions, the humidifier settings effortlessly adjustable via the remote control to fulfill different home space environments for the living room, study room, and bedroom, creating a personalized aromatherapy experience for you

[14-Color LED Lights]: Our diffuser offer 14 light modes with 7 ambient colors (cool/warm) and automatic color cycling. Can use it as a nightlight, decorative light, mood adjustment light. The light color can be customized according to your mood and interior decor style to heal your life with different colors every day.

[Best gift for home]: Our diffusers are constructed with baby-safe-grade PP material to ensure maximum safety for home use. Combining healthy and refreshing essential oil diffuser with an aesthetic design, they make thoughtful Christmas gifts for family and friends.

2 Mist Modes: The scent diffuser can provide stable cool mist to increases your room humidity without make your furniture and your floor to get humid. You can aslo adjust the mist mode to get low Mist: 30ml/h and high Mist: 60ml/h by pressing the power button to fit your room size

Remote Control: The aromatherapy diffuser is provide an easy to use remote control that can control it from up to 15-feet and adjust the lighting and misting modes as well as set the humidifier's timer, the diffuser has 1/3/6 hour timers and steady ON mode, as well as a auto-switch that prevents it from overheating in case it runs out of water

name: AirScent Hotel Diffuser Oil Inspired by The Ritz Carlton Hotel Scent - Premium Fragrance Oil No. 1014 for Ultrasonic and Waterless Diffusers and Crafting - 10 mL, 0.34 fl oz Glass Dropper Bottle
short_description: Fragrance Oil Notes - Sharp lemon, bergamot and fresh sea breeze open this uplifting hotel scent inspired by The Ritz Carlton scent. Jasmine, water lily and melon follow, with a base of amber and musk.

Clean Quality Fragrance Oils - As a fragrance manufacturer, we take pride in producing the highest quality and concentration of oils that are IFRA Compliant, non-GMO, Vegan and free from synthetic colors, parabens, phthalates and carrier oils.
Use In Essential Oil Diffusers - Versatile and adaptable, our aroma oils can be used in any type of water or waterless essential oil diffusers, reed diffusers, humidifiers or cold air diffusers.
Fragrances For Crafting - Ideal for crafters, our oils can also be integrated into a wide array of projects including candle making, soap making and other DIY crafts. Explore below.
Euro-Style Dropper Cap - Our fragrance oil bottles come equipped with a dropper cap for exact measurements, ensuring the right amount of diffuser oil without spills or waste.
